initcondition.formula: "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Auto Approval Limit" AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Primary Approver")
( "Total" > "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 1 Approval Limit" ) AND ( "User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Primary Approver") )
"User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Primary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") )
"User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Primary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") )
"User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Secondary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") )
"User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Secondary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") )
"User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Tertiary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") )
"User" IN ("Workflow:Approver Config:Tertiary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") )
